mapper.select: SELECT ifnull(cs.`count`, 0) as `count`, cid, c.code, name, locale_name, type, tel_prefix, time_zone, users_count, created_at, updated_at FROM countries AS c left JOIN (SELECT country_code as `code`, count(1) count FROM countries_sites GROUP BY country_code) AS cs ON c.`code` = cs.`code`
